name: m365 Tools
description: Get all the information you need about your Xiaomi m365 (Pro) and Segway Ninebot Max G30 and ES 1/2/3/4 with the m365 Tools app (the app is in no way associated with Xiaomi, Segway or Ninebot).    CURRENTLY ONLY FIRMWARE VERSIONS:  Xiaomi m365 (FW:1.3.4-1.5.4 and BLE 0.72/0.81/0.91 and Camialfa 0.73) Xiaomi m365 Pro (FW:1.5.2-1.6.8 and BLE 0.90/1.0.0/1.1.0 Camialfa 0.74) Segway Ninebot ES1 ES2 ES3 ES4 (FW 1.33-1.51 and BLE 1.0.6-1.0.9) Segway Ninebot MAX G30 (FW 1.19-1.26 and BLE 1.1.0-1.1.3)  ARE SUPPORTED! Do not update to newer versions if you want to continue to use this app. I can not guarantee that the app will work with upcoming updates!   - Nice dashboard layout with all the information you need during a ride - Detailed battery information - Log and display graphs of scooter metrics  - Track your rides and revise your journey on a map with visualized scooter metrics - Customise battery range estimation - Customise speed factor for different tire sizes or better speed precision  - Dark/White Theme option  - Customise color scheme - Custom mileometer - Scooter Notification in the status bar with remaining percentage and range - Set KERS Mode - Set scooter name - Set cruise control - Change scooter dashboard to miles  - Lock unlock the scooter and many more features...  Supported devices:  Xiaomi m365 (FW:1.3.4-1.5.4 and BLE 0.72/0.81/0.91 and Camialfa 0.73) Xiaomi m365 Pro (FW:1.5.2-1.6.8 and BLE 0.90/1.0.0/1.1.0 Camialfa 0.74) Segway Ninebot ES1 ES2 ES3 ES4 (FW 1.33-1.51 and BLE 1.0.6-1.0.9) Segway Ninebot MAX G30 (FW 1.19-1.26 and BLE 1.1.0-1.1.3)    Location Permission is needed in order to scan for bluetooth devices and to log your routes. Internet access is needed in order to upload crash reports.  Disclaimer: This App is in no way associated with Xiaomi and Segway. This app includes no warranty.  With this app you cannot flash your scooter  If you encounter problems or you have suggestions you can write me an email to: feedback@peretti.app If you want to help me with translations you can contact me at: translations@peretti.app  Join Beta Testing :  https://play.google.com/apps/testing/app.peretti.m365tools
